title: Covid and your heart
description: Get the latest coronavirus updates from our experts, including what Covid-19 means for you if you have a heart or circulatory condition.
cleaned_text: What's on this page: Long Covid treatment: tips for managing symptoms [Long Covid: symptoms, tests, treatment and support](/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/news/coronavirus-and-your-health/long-covid) We look at the symptoms of long Covid, what tests and treatments are available, and tips for recovery. [Long Covid recovery guide: tips for fatigue and breathlessness](/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/news/coronavirus-and-your-health/long-covid-recovery) We share expert tips for managing the symptoms of long Covid, including fatigue, shortness of breath, and brain fog - plus tips for boosting your mood. [Living with long Covid: Kerstin's story](/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/my-story/living-with-long-covid-kerstin-sailer) Find out more about Kerstin's experience of long Covid and how she manages her symptoms including fatigue, chest pain and palpitations. Coronavirus and your heart condition [Covid-19: what it means if you have heart or circulatory disease](/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/news/coronavirus-and-your-health) Our medical experts explain what we know so far about coronavirus and what it means for you, if you have heart or circulatory disease. [How does Covid-19 affect your heart?](/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/news/coronavirus-and-your-health/what-does-coronavirus-do-to-your-body) We explain how coronavirus progresses in the body, including how it can affect your heart and circulatory system. [Is coronavirus a disease of the blood vessels?](/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/news/coronavirus-and-your-health/is-coronavirus-a-disease-of-the-blood-vessels) Dr Phoebe Kitscha explores some of the biology behind the effects of Covid-19 on the circulatory system, and the research into ways to prevent and treat these effects. Covid vaccines: are they safe for people with heart conditions? [Covid vaccines: your questions answered](/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/news/coronavirus-and-your-health/coronavirus-vaccine-your-questions-answered) Everything you need to know about the Covid vaccine, including safety, effectiveness and side effects. [Covid booster vaccines: what you need to know](/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/news/coronavirus-and-your-health/covid-booster-vaccine) Get the latest updates on Covid-19 booster vaccines, including who will get one, when, and which vaccine you will get. [Myocarditis and Covid-19 vaccines: should you be worried?](/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/news/coronavirus-and-your-health/coronavirus-vaccine-your-questions-answered/myocarditis-and-covid-19-vaccines-should-you-be-worried) We look at the link between myocarditis and Covid-19 vaccines, including which age groups are at a higher risk. What to do if you test positive for Covid-19 [I have a heart condition: what do I do if I test positive for Covid-19?](/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/news/coronavirus-and-your-health/what-do-i-do-if-i-have-coronavirus) Read our guide to what to do if you get coronavirus, especially if you have a heart or circulatory condition. [Cold, flu or Covid: which is it?](/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/news/coronavirus-and-your-health/coronavirus-symptoms-cold-flu-or-coronavirus) We explain the main symptoms of coronavirus, cold and flu, and how to tell the difference. [Can you get Covid twice? How soon can you get it again?](/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/news/coronavirus-and-your-health/covid-news) Is it possible to catch Covid-19 more than once? If so, how quickly can you get it again? We look at the answers.
